name: Debugger Console
desc: An interactive console tool for Scratch projects, allowing real-time terminal interactions.
info:
This extensions is a continued
version of NOname-awa's
Debugger Extension.
Here's original extension

name: E2EE
desc: This is a Scratch 3 extension that enables E2EE (End-to-End Encryption). This E2EE extension utilizes the same underlying cryptography src that powers CloudLink Omega.

name: WebRTC
desc: A slimmed-down version of the CL5 protocol extension, designed to offer a basic implementation of the WebRTC standard for Scratch 3.

name: FNF Sprites parser
desc: Can Parse FNF Spritesheets (only XML) and parse FNF Icon Grid.

name: Markdown to HTML V2
desc:
Converts Markdown to HTML code.
This is V2 of ElectraMod's MD2HTML (V2 is better)
info: The difference between V1 and V2 lies in the choice of parser used to interpret Markdown. In V1, the extension used a built-in parser that was poorly coded, which could lead to performance issues or errors in Markdown interpretation. However, in V2, the extension was recoded to use Marked instead of the built-in parser. Marked, a JavaScript library widely recognized for its reliability and accuracy in Markdown parsing.
